response.original_title: Life after War: Haunted by Helmand
response.overview: Five members of the same platoon were killed on the 10th July 2009 in what remains the worst incident for a British foot patrol in the history of the Afghan campaign. Through powerful and touching interviews with some of the young soldiers who survived the attack, this film reveals how their lives are still haunted by the horrors of Helmand.
response.title: Life after War: Haunted by Helmand
